title: 菜根谭
text: 谭者，谈也。性定菜根香。 昔日所云我，而今却是伊。不知今日我，又属后来谁。？

title: Hello World
text: Quick Start liuyanhui 123456789101112loadsh### Create a new post``` bash$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
